>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/2.0/community/blog/tag"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns a list of all the tags used in the blog posts with a number specifying the tag usage.

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"List of tags","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"Name":{"type":"string","example":"Sample tag"},"Count":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","example":"10"}},"title":"BlogTagWrapper"}}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
